title: Electrical Pulse Stimulation

posLR <- clinical |> 
  select(study, tp:fp) |> 
  rename_with(toupper) |> 
  rename(names = STUDY) |>
  mada::madad() |> 
  purrr::pluck("posLR")

negLR <- clinical |> 
  select(study, tp:fp) |> 
  rename_with(toupper) |> 
  rename(names = STUDY) |>
  mada::madad() |> 
  purrr::pluck("negLR")

posLR_dat <- cbind(as.data.frame(do.call(cbind, posLR)))[-4] 
names(posLR_dat) <- c("posLR", "lower", "upper")

negLR_dat <- cbind(as.data.frame(do.call(cbind, negLR)))[-4]
names(negLR_dat) <- c("negLR", "lower", "upper")

posLR_dat |>
  mutate(est = sprintf("%1.1f (%1.1f-%1.1f)", posLR, lower, upper)) |> 
  select(est)
    
negLR_dat |>
  mutate(est = sprintf("%1.2f (%1.2f-%1.2f)", negLR, lower, upper)) |> 
  select(est)


bivariate <- clinical |> 
  select(study, tp:fp) |> 
  rename_with(toupper) |> 
  rename(names = STUDY) |>
  mada::reitsma()  

plot(bivariate, predict = TRUE)









meta_sens <- meta::metaprop(tp, tp + fn,
  data = clinical,
  studlab = study,
  sm = "PLOGIT",
  method = "GLMM",
  method.tau = "ML",
  incr = 0,
  hakn = TRUE,
  prediction = TRUE
)

meta::forest(meta_sens)
